title: Stroke - a blow against life
creator_credit: Australian Brain Foundation, Geoff Owen-Taylor and Jeff Spencer
brief_description: The causes of stroke and its effects on the individual are discussed in detail. Also discussed are some of the support structures and rehabilitation programs nesessary for recovery. Hosted by Dan Webb.
